attributes.action: defend our animals licencing and insurance , equality is what's needed
attributes.additional_details: Nikita rooyen recently had her beautiful not so little dog attack by another and still has not had justice , we need to stop ✋ this from happening to other dog owners so that they know a pay out will come if there dog is injured by another in any way , please sign this petition and get every dog insured and get the government to make sure every person has a licences to have an animal , this is very concerning as the person who done this still hasn't been brought to justice thankyou to everyone who does
attributes.background: There has been a disscussion between a few people friends and family and we would like your help to protest that every animal or animal owner should have to have a full licence & insurance 48hrs before purchase to own a animal this would help prevent vet bills from attacks and prevent animal abuse
